Crossover moves?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Techs/Tech Chains: Crossover moves?
By Anonymous on Thursday, June 22, 2000 - 10:55 am:

Can someone write up a list of all the possible crossover moves you can get from your sub breed (like phantom claw for a pixie/kato). thanks

By Nate Railsback on Friday, June 23, 2000 - 03:03 pm:

I did a preliminary list before, but here comes another incomplete one:

Pixie:
/Kato: Phantom Claw
/Dragon: Fire Breath
/Zuum: Fire Breath
/Joker: Death Final
/Hare: 1-2 Punch

Hopper:
/Kato: Phantom Claw

Kato:
/Tiger: Bolt
/Mocchi: Licking
/Suezo: Lick

(That's all that springs to mind at this exact moment. Feel free to add on.)

By SCT on Friday, June 23, 2000 - 05:21 pm:

Hopper:
/Pixie:Flame
/Dragon:Flame

By Anonymous on Wednesday, July 5, 2000 - 02:49 pm:

does anyone know if a siren (undine/joker) can get any joker moves? i am planning to raise one of those next and would like to know. thanks

By Nate Railsback on Wednesday, July 5, 2000 - 03:12 pm:

Nope. It makes it easier to get the Undine's evil moves, Aqua Whip and Two Whips, as well as get the Power to use them. However, they're really not all that great. Death Energy would make a nice addition to an Undine's repertoire, but sadly it and all other Joker techs are a decided no-show on this mixed breed.

By RaPtOr2157 on Wednesday, July 5, 2000 - 05:37 pm:

Hopper also has lightning from pixie and tiger(???, not sure).

By Nate Railsback on Wednesday, July 5, 2000 - 06:48 pm:

Actually, I don't think Lightning is a crossover move. I got it just fine with a Hopper/Kato.

By Eagle_Fierce on Wednesday, July 5, 2000 - 11:50 pm:

I agree, Nate. Lightning is a Withering tech, if i remember correctly, and can be gotten with any Hopper species, with varying degree of difficulty.

By gosamerwings on Saturday, August 19, 2000 - 01:23 pm:

hell i combined a hopper and a balon tiger/gali and got ligthning off the jump and question why are there such a small amount of monsters with crossover techs this i am investigating if someone can help with this search please do do it would probably save me alot of time...??? makes you think could there be another fire move when mixing a dragon and a dino together.even email me with the info if any one can i will be thankful ^*^ gos.

By JöKer on Wednesday, September 27, 2000 - 11:13 pm:

Does joker have any crosover techs or any thing that can gilve joker a extra move? kinda helpfull...

By Eagle Fierce on Thursday, September 28, 2000 - 02:24 pm:

No, but the Joker species tends to have a naturally longer than average 4th stage (as was discovered by Kurasu), as well as better stat gains than most monsters. If you get a Joker sub-type, the monster will not only have the genetically natural extended 4th stage, but generally has the ability to learn the cross-over technique, "Death Final."
